WarlockLevel4Spells.Name: Banishment
WarlockLevel4Spells.Description: You attempt to send one creature that you can see within range to another plane of existence.

WarlockLevel4Spells.Name: Blight
WarlockLevel4Spells.Description: Necromantic energy washes over a creature of your choice that you can see within range, draining moisture and vitality from it.

WarlockLevel4Spells.Name: Dimension Door
WarlockLevel4Spells.Description: You teleport yourself from your current location to any other spot within range.

WarlockLevel4Spells.Name: Hallucinatory Terrain
WarlockLevel4Spells.Description: You make natural terrain in a 150-foot cube in range look, sound, and even smell like some other sort of natural terrain.
